Malene M. McMahon
Modernization Consultant at Payments Canada
June 17, 2009, Malene M. was a client of Robert Francis’

Robert's advise has been absolutely spot on with regard to investment management of one of my retirement portfolios. His soft-sell approach and client-focus were well appreciate since I am a financial service professional myself and tend to be pretty savvy on investment matters. Even so, good external advise and guidance is always needed when you are planning your retirement. I would highly recommend Rob as a financial advisor. He has given first rate advice and is proactive with his clients on making appropriate potential 'switching' decisions ahead of market changes that can make a very big difference in results. Rob is an absolutely superior financial advisor.

Donna Zucchi
President and Executive Coach at DMZ Consultants
February 26, 2011, Robert Francis was a client of Donna’s

I was very lucky to meet Donna Zucchi at a weekend seminar on effective communication, and when it became clear that she was the class leader, I knew I had to introduce myself to this exceptional woman. When I heard about her amazing accomplishments on and off Wall Street, I was very happy to learn about her new career in coaching and consulting, and my decision to hire her as a coach and advisor to my start-up was an easy one. From the beginning, Donna got me thinking bigger and setting larger goals. The advice she offered was worth far more than her fee, and she took a deep personal interest in me and the success of our business. Donna's head for sales, marketing and communication is equaled only by the heart she brings to her work. Rob SullivanManaging PartnerWealth Shield Financial
